name: Symbian OS 9.1+ Installation File
summary: Learn about .SISX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SISX files are similar to .SIS files, except they are compatible only with devices running Symbian OS 9.1 or later. Developers create SISX files the same way they create SIS files, using the makesis (MakeSIS) and signsis (SignSIS) tools included with the CreateSIS application.

description: A SISX file is a software installer for Symbian OS 9.1 or later. It is used to install an app on a Symbian OS device, such as cell phones that use the Nokia S60 3rd Edition platform or the UIQ 3 platform. Various Nokia and Samsung smartphones use the Nokia S60 platform. Primarily, Sony Ericsson and Motorola phones use the UIQ 3 platform.

instructions: You can use the Nokia PC Suite (Windows) to transfer a SISX file to a compatible Nokia mobile phone and install the app the SISX file contains. If you need to transfer a SISX file to another type of phone or mobile device, use that device's associated software.
If you want to view a SISX file's contents, you can unpack the file with SISContents (Windows) or Deark (Windows).
